name: WAGMI Games
description: WAGMI Games is a pioneering Web3 entertainment company founded in 2021, driven by the mission to redefine the gaming and entertainment landscape. Our aim is to create a vibrant ecosystem that brings together gamers, content creators, and enthusiasts from across the globe, offering them a unique blend of compelling gameplay, digital collectibles, and rich storytelling experiences. At the core of our strategy is the goal to foster mass adoption of Web3 technology by making it accessible, engaging, and beneficial for everyone. Our first title, "WAGMI Defense," is designed to serve as a strategic entry point into the world of Web3 gaming. It integrates innovative gameplay mechanics with a comprehensive NFT economy, allowing players to have true ownership of in-game items. "WAGMI Defense" officially launched on December 12, 2024, on Google Play and the App Store, marking a major milestone in our mission to bring Web3 gaming to mainstream audiences.
